intro: Psychotria yagawensis, commonly known as Yagaw's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments within lowland rainforests. Psychotria yagawensis is often found growing along stream banks and in dense undergrowth.
